players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks."
You: "I'm concerned about Bob's sudden disappearance and I believe we should all be vigilant. Let's try to gather more information during the night to help us figure out what happened."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice that we should all be vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious activity during the night. Let's work together to uncover the truth behind Bob's death."
